scripts.buid:docs: rm -rf docs && mv build docs && mkdir -p build/react-app-code-samples && cp -R docs/* build/react-app-code-samples
scripts.build:patch: npm ci && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run build:commit
scripts.build:minor: npm ci && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run build:commit
scripts.build:major: npm ci && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run build:commit
scripts.build:commit: npm run build && npm run commit
scripts.commit: npm run commit:docs && npm run commit:package
scripts.commit:docs: git add docs && git commit -m 'Added - Docs for github pages'
scripts.commit:package: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m 'New version - v'$npm_package_version
